Previous: spṛdhNext: spṛh

√spṛś 'touch'

present: [6.] spṛśati etc. V.+  spṛśate etc. AV.+  spṛśāna   -- [1.] asparśat  

perfect: paspṛśus  paspṛśe E.+  pasparśus?  paspárśat  

aorist: [1.] spṛśyāt   -- [3.] pisṛśas  pisṛśati   -- [4.] asprākṣam etc.  aspārkṣīt   -- [7.] áspṛkṣat etc.  

future: [1.] sprakṣyati etc.  sparkṣyati   -- [2.] spraṣṭā  sparṣṭā  

verbal: spṛṣṭá AV.+  spraṣṭum E.+  spṛṣṭvā B.+  -spṛ́śya B.+  -spṛ́śe  -spṛ́śas  

secondary: passive: spṛśyate etc. E.+   -- intensive: parīspṛś-   -- desiderative: pispṛkṣa-   -- causative: sparśayati etc. B.+  sparśayate  

derivatives: -spṛś V.+  -spṛśa E.+  spṛśya E.+  sparśa AV.+  sparśin S.+  sparśana U.S.+  sparśanīya E.+  spṛśi C.  spṛ́ṣṭi B.+  spraṣṭavyà B.+  spraṣṭṛ́ B.+  sparśitṛ E.  pispṛkṣu E.+  sparśayitavya U.  

Compare √pṛś, pṛṣ; a part of the words there given may with considerable plausibility be connected with this root.
